name: float: champions
description:
Fight to stay at the top of the hill in intense matches with up to 6 beans. Use platforming skills to quickly traverse up the hill and leave the other players in the dust. Climb your way up the ranks and forge your place on the leaderboard.

"Features"

  • anvils
use your anvil to send players flying, but if timed incorrectly, they can be used against you

  • wall jumping
against certain surfaces your able to zoom up them by jumping continuously, doing this allows you to quickly get to the top

  • ground slam
holding shift sends the player downward while also making them bouncy, use this to gain lots of height and sometimes pass parts of the course if used correctly.

  • customization
with a variety of different items for your bean to wear you can make your bean the drippiest of them all.

  • online multiplayer
go up against your friends or find random people to play against

  • bean
bean
Reviews

If your not yet convinced, just see what our reviewers have to say!
